QuestData.Title: And No Maces!
QuestData.Description: There are far too many bright-eyed young rogues being sent through this portal and off to war. If I'm going to start up my academy again, some of them have got to survive this little excursion.$B$BWhile I'm here, I figured I might as well use the opportunity to gather some supplies for my grand opening. You can't start a business without plenty of daggers, after all.$B$BGrab me a crate of weaponry from the Grimrail Depot, there should be plenty lying around. I'll have something nice for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Huge Crate of Weapons in Grimrail Depot.
